attributes.action: Ensure life saving cancer treatment is not affected due to the covid pandemic.
attributes.additional_details: Specialist covid hospital have been built that sit empty and have not been utilised during this pandemic. Instead, hospitals are being overwhelmed with covid patients which is having a long term effect on other illnesses. No persons life saving treatment should be affected. Every patient deserves treatment and no illness is more of a priority than others. Treat all patients fairly and don’t cancel life saving treatment or operations. #AllLivesMatter #CancerLivesMatter
attributes.background: The government needs to recognise and publish the amount of deaths that have occurred since the covid pandemic that are a result of life saving treatment being affected due to covid. The government needs to make provisions for cancer patients treatments to not be affected any further.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552734
